description:
codereview: re-enable 15-second status prints

Also print all status changes when using hg -v.

The start_status_thread call was lost during the refactoring in
https://codereview.appspot.com/5395044/diff/6006/lib/codereview/codereview.py
Oops.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

ha ha ha clicked on the wrong link before.

i should just go away

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ec901f2b8171 ***

codereview: re-enable 15-second status prints

Also print all status changes when using hg -v.

The start_status_thread call was lost during the refactoring in
https://codereview.appspot.com/5395044/diff/6006/lib/codereview/codereview.py
Oops.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7834044
It's been a few months since the last codereview SNAFU, could this debugging be turned off now ?

No, it's status, not debugging. Any time code review is taking > 15
seconds, a print should happen.

I think this is because I had verbose=true in my .hgrc. Sorry for the
noise, that'll teach me for using copy pasta.

subject: code review 7834044: codereview: re-enable 15-second status prints
